Crawl

Sinopse: Against all logic, competitive swimmer Haley drives into the mouth of a furiously destructive Category 5 hurricane on a collision course with her hometown of Florida. But the young woman is desperate to check in on her estranged father, Dave. Instead, an alligator-infested town awaits her. Now, trapped in the tangled mess of their flooded house's labyrinthine crawl space, the father and daughter must face an unexpected, unstoppable adversary: a merciless pair of six-metre predators silently stalking them. As Haley and Dave gasp for air in the claustrophobic basement, only their will to survive can help them stand a chance against the powerful jaws of the scaly enemy. And the question remains. Can they escape without being eaten alive?—Nick Riganas
